Title: Permits municipalities, schools and fire and police departments to display and sell symbols of hope
Summary: Permits municipal corporations, fire districts, volunteer fire companies, police departments and school districts to sell and display symbols of hope in support of law enforcement, emergency medical personnel, the military, border patrol, firefighters, conservation officers and others.
LawCode: Add §§99-x & 209-gg, Gen Muni L; add §1527-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the education law, in relation to symbols of hope
